name: suite-key
effect: Opens the locked building in the lakeside resort.
short_effect: Opens a locked building in the Lakeside Resort.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A key to one of the suites at a certain luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A key to one of the suites at a certain luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A key to one of the suites at a certain luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
